meanings.definition: A person or thing that typifies something.
meanings.sent1: The teacher was a typifiers of kindness, always helping students in need.
meanings.sent2: The book character was a typifiers of bravery, facing danger without fear.
meanings.sent3: The typifiers of clumsiness, the cat knocked over the vase with a playful leap.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a typifiers of joy, lighting up the room with happiness.
meanings.sent5: The old tree stood as a typifiers of strength, weathering many storms over the years.

meanings.definition: To serve as a typical example of something.
meanings.sent1: His actions typifiers honesty, always telling the truth no matter what.
meanings.sent2: The bright colors typifiers the vibrant culture of the city.
meanings.sent3: The way she danced typifiers grace, moving with elegance and poise.
meanings.sent4: The stars typifiers the vastness of the universe, shining brightly in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of fresh bread typifiers comfort, bringing back memories of home.
